Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to the regulation of betting
Summary: Provides for regulation of betting; defines terms; implements a tax equivalent to eight and one-half percent of wagering gross revenue; requires reporting; provides for civil penalties for violations; makes related provisions.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to regulation of betting
